version_description:
Fixed: widget height resizes briefly when widget appears

* Timezones are difficult, but can now fix any timezone issues remotely. So if you see any timezones misbehaving, just send us an email.

Fixed: widget height resizes briefly when widget appears

* Timezones are difficult, but can now fix any timezone issues remotely. So if you see any timezones misbehaving, just send us an email.

• Supports iOS 10 style Today Extension
• Haptic feedback support
• Design change
Fixed: Unable to display clocks in Today Extension
